mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectDspCnrSet Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ REV_SN , CNR_SN , CNR_SET_SN , CNR_TP_GRP_SN , SET_NM , SET_DSCR , DSP_YN , RND_YN , SORT_SEQ , ALTRTV_DSP_GOD_TP_CD , DSP_CTGRY_NO , DSP_BRND_CTGRY_NO , DSP_BRND_ID , PROMT_SN , EVT_NO , STRND_SN , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM DSP_CNR_SET WHERE 1 = 1 AND REV_SN = #{revSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND CNR_SN = #{cnrSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND CNR_SET_SN = #{cnrSetSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
